MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G40 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Millroad Drive. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:15pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network outside 216 Millroad Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:42pm on Sunday, 14 February 2021
